channel.title: Posts on Starcoin News
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Starcoin News

item.title: Starcoin BlockChain release the First developer version
item.description: Stacoin 区块链发布了第一个开发者测试版本–Halley,该版本包含了很多新技术，包括 Move 智能合约语言，Move 虚拟机等等。开发者可以通过这里下载预编译版本，也可以通过github下载源代码编译，具体编译方法可以参考相关文档。具体使用方法可以参考使用文档。 Stacoin Blockchain released its first developer beta, Halley, which contains a lot of new features. technologies, including Move Smart Contract Language, Move Virtual Machine, and more. Developers can download a pre-compiled version here, or through the github download the source code compiled, specific compilation method You can refer to the related [documents]((http://developer.starcoin.org/en/build/). Please refer to the documentation on how to use it.

item.title: Starcoin BlockChain release the Second developer version
item.description: Stacoin 区块链开发者测试版 Halley 的第二个版本,该版本包含了很多新特性，比如升级了stdlib，增强了区块验证逻辑，重构了区块执行器等。开发者可以通过这里下载预编译版本，也可以通过github下载源代码编译，具体编译方法可以参考相关文档。具体使用方法可以参考使用文档。 The second version of the Stacoin blockchain developer beta for Halley, which includes many new features. such as upgraded stdlib, enhanced block validation logic, refactored block executors, etc. Developers can download the pre-compiled version here, you can also download the compiled source code through github, specific compilation methods You can refer to the related documents. Please refer to the (documentation)[http://developer.starcoin.org/en/first_transaction/] on how to use it.
